page.title: 14HOUSING.
page.content: In Spaldwick there are not many houses built in the last ten years, only six. The houses on the High Street are the oldest houses. Some are more then 300 years old.There are many council houses and old peoples bungalows. Some people have bought their own council houses. At the moment there are no plans for any more building in Spaldwick. In Ellington there are four new housing developments. Ellington is a popular village for people to move into because it is close to the A1 and the station. Most of the new houses are detached houses with double garages. In Easton the new houses are very big and expensive. There are not many of them. Easton is the smallest village, but it has more thatched houses then Ellington or Spaldwick.
